confirmDeletePixel: Are you sure you want to delete this pixel?
cannotEraseOthersPixels: You can only erase your own pixels!
helpBasicOperationsText:
• Select Color: Click on palette colors or use the custom color picker
• Draw Pixels: Click anywhere on the canvas to place a 4x4 pixel block
• Eraser: Select the eraser tool to remove your own pixels
• Recent Colors: System automatically saves your last 10 used colors
• Pixel Preview: Hover to see preview of pixel to be drawn
• Pixel Info: Hover over existing pixels to view pixel info and owner
helpViewControlsText:
• Zoom: Use mouse wheel to zoom (0.1x - 5x range)
• Pan: Hold and drag with left mouse button to move canvas
• Reset View: Click reset button to restore default zoom and position
• Zoom Buttons: Use top zoom in/out buttons for precise control
• Keyboard Shortcuts: Ctrl/Cmd + +/-/0 for zoom control
helpUserFeaturesText:
• User Authentication: Each user has a unique ID for cross-device usage
• Permission Control: Only erase your own pixels, cannot modify others' work
• Cloud Sync: All operations are synchronized to LeanCloud in real-time
• Auto Save: Automatically saves 2 seconds after drawing, with countdown in status bar
• Manual Save: Click save button or use Ctrl+S to save immediately
• Data Loading: Click load button to fetch latest data from cloud
helpShortcutsText:
• Ctrl/Cmd + S: Manual save to cloud
• Ctrl/Cmd + +: Zoom in canvas
• Ctrl/Cmd + -: Zoom out canvas
• Ctrl/Cmd + 0: Reset zoom to default size
• Mouse wheel: Zoom canvas
• Left mouse drag: Pan canvas view
• ESC key: Close current popup or modal
helpStatusFeaturesText:
• Total Pixels: Shows total number of pixels placed by all users
• Last Saved Time: Displays when data was last successfully saved to cloud
• Auto Save Countdown: Shows 2-second countdown after drawing, auto-saves when complete
• Loading Status: Detailed loading progress and status during app initialization
• Pixel Coordinates: Shows precise coordinate position when hovering over pixels
helpErrorHandlingText:
• Full-screen Error Display: Shows clear error messages and solutions when errors occur
• Retry Function: Provides retry button for network errors to reattempt operations
• Error Classification: Distinguishes different error types (login, save, load, etc.)
• User-friendly: Error messages support multi-language display with clear action guidance
• Auto Recovery: Some errors automatically attempt recovery without user intervention
confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear the canvas?
userIdExists: User ID already exists, please choose another ID or login directly
createUserFailed: Create user failed, please try again
initializationFailed: Initialization failed, please refresh and try again
aboutProjectText: SAR Map Pixel is a collaborative pixel art canvas that allows multiple users to draw 4x4 pixel blocks on a shared canvas. Each user has a unique identity and can place their own pixels while only being able to erase content they created. All data is synchronized to the cloud in real-time, supporting cross-device access.
aboutAIText: This website is 100% generated by artificial intelligence, including frontend interface, backend logic, user interactions, multi-language support, and all other features. This demonstrates the powerful capabilities of modern AI in full-stack web development, from requirement analysis to code implementation, completely accomplished autonomously by AI.
aboutOpenSourceText: The project is completely open source, hosted on GitHub: github.com/LoXidEv/SARMapPixel Tech Stack: Vue 3 + Vite + LeanCloud License: MIT License Welcome to contribute code, report issues, or suggest improvements!
aboutTestingText: This website is for testing and demonstration purposes only. We do not guarantee data persistence or service stability. Please do not store important information here. We may periodically clean data or perform system maintenance.
aboutTechnologyText:
• Real-time Collaboration: Multiple users drawing online simultaneously with real-time sync
• Cloud Storage: Data persistence based on LeanCloud
• Responsive Design: Support for desktop and mobile devices
• Multi-language Support: Chinese, English, Traditional Chinese
• User System: Unique ID identification with cross-device access
• Permission Control: Can only modify your own pixels
• Auto Save: Automatically saves to cloud after drawing
• Error Handling: Comprehensive error prompts and retry mechanisms
